data.question: Is there a free trial?
data.answer: While we don't offer a free trial, we do offer a 7-day month back guarantee on our standard plans. If you decide the product isn't the right for within 7 days we will give you a refund, no questions asked. Simply email us at support@sellgo.com to speak to the team.

data.question: What marketplaces are supported?
data.answer: Sellgo is currently compatible with many Amazon marketplaces. Such as United States, Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Italy, and Spain. Some features on Sellgo are currently limited to the U.S. market.

data.question: What is Sellgo's product?
data.answer: Sellgo is a web App where you can find features for bulk analysis, seller research, product research, etc. Extension is our browser extension for Chrome that provides more product data when you are browsing Amazon search pages.

data.question: How many users can I have on my account?
data.answer: Sellgo works great for any kind of teams. If you need more access, we encourage you to add users to your account, each with their own secured login access. Our Basic plan is limited to 1 user. Our Professional plan includes 1 user, with the option to add more users you need at $39/month per access (or $407/yr on an annual plan). Our Team plan includes 7 users, but you can add more users at $39/month per access (or $407/yr on an annual plan).

data.question: What information can be given to authorized users?
data.answer: As the account owner, you have complete control of your account. You can customize access for additional users through Login Management settings. The additional users will not have access to billing information, your credit card number, nor have authorization to make changes to your account. All additional user's access can be added through invite, and revoked anytime.

data.question: Can I cancel anytime?
data.answer: Yes, there are no contractual obligations further than your current billing cycle. If you cancel, your subscription will stop following the current term with no further charges. You can also upgrade your plan at any time and any incremental charges will be prorated. If you are a new customer, all priced plans offer a 7-day money-back guarantee (special promotions or trials excluded). If you cancel within this 7-day period, you will receive a full refund.

data.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
data.answer: Sellgo accepts secure onsite payment processing and accepts Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. If you do not have a credit card, email us at support@sellgo.com and we can send you a Paypal invoice.

data.question: Will I pay the same price every month?
data.answer: As of July 26, 2021, the price you pay for all standard Sellgo plans will not change from month to month. If you have specific requests, please reach out to support@sellgo.com to find out what plan best suits your needs.
